item.title: Work
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
[cudazi_column width='6' class='alpha' ]
This is a page using the Portfolio Grid page template, set to use this specific layout. You can control the number of posts per page and which category or categories of the portfolio custom post type to display.
[cudazi_column_end]
[cudazi_column width='6' class='omega' ]
The portfolio items are individual posts, a custom post type called Portfolio. The thumbnail is auto-sized using the WordPress featured image and can link to the post, image or any URL you may need!
[cudazi_column_end] [cudazi_clear]

item.title: Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
This page is full of shortcodes, formatting and examples. You can always copy/paste the formatting from this page to another or use the sample content text files included in the download.
[cudazi_promotext]Add a link or just spruce up plain text with this promo text shortcode![/cudazi_promotext]
Column Shortcodes
The column shortcode can be used in the main content area of any page template or even inserted into a text widget. It is handy for making columns of text, images or videos. You can set the columns in widths from 1-12.

This page is full of shortcodes, formatting and examples. You can always copy/paste the formatting from this page to another or use the sample content text files included in the download. [cudazi_promotext]Add a link or just spruce up plain text with this promo text shortcode![/cudazi_promotext]

Column Shortcodes

The column shortcode can be used in the main content area of any page template or even inserted into a text widget. It is handy for making columns of text, images or videos. You can set the columns in widths from 1-12.

item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded: When you have a LOT to say. (You can always split it back up with the column shortcodes!) Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. item.title: About the Photos
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded: The amazing photos used in this demo site are from Mark J. Sebastian unless noted otherwise. Please visit his site to see more examples of his work or to work with him on digital photography and HD video services in the New York, Los Angeles and San Jose areas.

item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
Contact form with built-in JavaScript and PHP validation.

item.title: Four Column
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
[cudazi_column width='6' class='alpha' ]
This is a page using the Portfolio Grid page template, set to use this specific layout. You can control the number of posts per page and which category or categories of the portfolio custom post type to display.
[cudazi_column_end]
[cudazi_column width='6' class='omega' ]
The portfolio items are individual posts, a custom post type called Portfolio. The thumbnail is auto-sized using the WordPress featured image and can link to the post, image or any URL you may need!
[cudazi_column_end] [cudazi_clear]

item.title: Full Width Map
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
Page using the full width page template and Google Maps embed code.
<iframe width="978" height="500" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0" src="http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&q=Coffee+Shops&aq=0&sll=39.099885,-84.511042&sspn=0.00592,0.009012&ie=UTF8&st=115968771510351694523&rq=1&ev=p&split=1&radius=0.29&hq=Coffee+Shops&hnear=&ll=39.102332,-84.512469&spn=0.001665,0.005075&z=17&output=embed"></iframe>

item.title: Gallery Shortcode
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
http://codex.wordpress.org/Gallery_Shortcode Use the default WordPress [gallery] shortcode on any page, post or even text widget, it's built into WordPress. I've pre-styled it for you and it uses the custom image sizes defined in this theme. I have these set to link to the file so the lightbox will enlarge when clicked. [gallery link="file" columns="4" size="grid_3"]

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
[cudazi_slider slide_delay="0" categories="home"]

Upscale, Modern & Minimal.

[cudazi_column width='6' class='alpha' ] Mono is a clean, luxurious WordPress theme perfect for a wide range of sites. This theme uses custom post types, has ample widget areas and drag and drop menus for easy setup and maximum flexibility. [cudazi_column_end] [cudazi_column width='6' class='omega' ] This WordPress theme is well-documented and is fully backed by an author with a great reputation providing free support and upgrades. Please explore all areas of this demo and see what this theme has to offer! [cudazi_column_end] [cudazi_clear]

item.title: Colors / Skins
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
The theme can be customized using the WordPress Custom Background in Appearance > Backgrounds which allows easily uploading of background images or setting of background colors. The primary and secondary link colors can be set using a color picker in the OptionTree theme settings and you can choose a predefined css skin.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickies to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Hidden Title
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
This page has the title hidden by adding a custom field of hide_title with a value of yes. Why do this? Because sometimes the title just gets in the way. The home page is a perfect example of this since I have the slider at the top of the page and added in my own Heading 2 below like this:

This is a Heading

You can do this on posts too, and even hide meta with hide_meta on posts.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Hi, this is a comment.
To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.title: Other Slide 01

item.title: Video and Content
item.dc:creator: cudazi
item.content:encoded:
Video + Content

[cudazi_promotext]Make every slide unique to fit your style and love your site.[/cudazi_promotext] Slides are a custom post type, allowing you to add content using the WordPress editor you’re comfortable using. The slides are displayed using a shortcode. Add multiple sliders, each pulling from a different category. Since you insert the content, it can link anywhere - posts, pages, external links or lightboxes!
